question.title: What is the primary goal of surgical treatment for hemorrhoidal pathology?
question.description: The main objective of surgical treatment for hemorrhoids

option_a.title: To reduce symptoms and improve quality of life

option_c.title: To improve bowel function and prevent future occurrences

option_d.title: To treat underlying medical conditions that may be contributing to hemorrhoids
option_d.description: Medical management and treatment of underlying conditions
